title: Digital Systems Design
description: Full-custom design and analysis of digital circuits using full CMOS, pass-transistor and dynamic circuit topologies. Transistor sizing for minimizing power consumption, delay and other design criteria. 3 seminars, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/EEÂ 523.
prerequisites: CPE/EE 329 or CPE/EE 336 or equivalent, and graduate standing or consent of instructor
